summary: A team of technicians and scientist undertake a thorough site survey of the Titanic shipwreck area to examine how the passenger ship sank.
cast: Jonathan Adams|Christopher Davino|James Delgado|David Gallo|Ken Marschall|James R. Chiles|Bill Sauder|William Lange|Parks Stephenson|Mark Heinrich|Evan Kovacs|Michael Dessner|Mark Dennett|Greg J. Packard|Alexandra Klingelhofer|Michael Boardman|Priscilla Chase|Cindy Czubryt|Wyndham Juneau|Emily Lambert|John Lundquist|E.J. Smith|David Alberg|Daniel Allen Butler|Andrew McKeough|Simon Mills
title: Titanic at 100: Mystery Solved
